parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A knower of the inner life (character, hearts). From kardia and ginosko; a heart-knower.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From ana and deiknuo; to exhibit, i.e. to indicate, appoint.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular

str2: From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To pick out for myself, choose, elect, select. Middle voice from ek and lego; to select.
